Text.Name: Body_Gong_1
Text.Desc: A remold cultivation Law passed down from ancient times that imitates the shapes of all creatures, follows the will of the universe and obeys the law of the six directions. This spell excels at integrating with nature and step by step evolving into one unifying entity that signifies the intricacy of all the creatures in the world. The physical body becomes divine and embraces oblivion.
Text.SelectDesc: Physical training means combining energy, Qi and spirit into one, cutting out Qi and any other magical items and beginning practice with only the physical body. Do you want to take this Law?
